commit.message:
Fix some of the existing Cilk tests for the new errors.

gcc/testsuite/:

2014-11-10  Andi Kleen  <ak@linux.intel.com>

	* c-c++-common/cilk-plus/AN/misc.c (main): Handle
	new cilk errors.
